actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Dynamic Technology International, Inc., Lew Malnak Associates, Star Design Inc., Riverside Precision Machines, and certain other individuals.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a sum to be determined to certain organizations and individuals in full satisfaction of their claims against the United States for damages resulting from certain actions of U.S. agents, officers, and employees committed prior to, during, and after various contract investigations.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Dynamic Technology International, Inc., Lew Malnak Associates, Star Design Inc., Riverside Precision Machines, and certain other individuals.
